content.text:
** means the present current state of the respective feature

[Table: table_20_673]

An Opal SSC compliant Storage Device SHALL return the following:
• 
Feature Code 
= 0x0002 
• 
Version 
= 0x3 or any version that supports the defined features in this SSC 
• 
Length 
= 0x0C 
• 
HW Reset for LOR/DOR Supported     = VU 
• 
MBR Shadowing Not Supported 
= 0 
o 
MBR Shadowing feature SHALL be supported. See section 4.3.5.4. 
• 
MBR Done 
= **  
• 
MBR Enabled 
= ** 
• 
Media Encryption 
= 1 
• 
Locked 
= ** 
• 
Locking Enabled 
= See section 3.1.1.3.1 
• 
Locking Supported 
= 1

| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Byte | | | | | | | | |
| 0 | (MSB) | | | | | | | Feature Code (0x0002) |
| 1 | | | | | | | | (LSB) |
| 2 | | | | | | | Version | Reserved |
| 3 | | | | | | | | Length |
| 4 | HW Reset for LOR/DOR Supported | MBR Shadowing Not Supported | | MBR Done | MBR Enabled | Media Encryption | Locked | Locking Enabled |
| | | | | | | | | Locking Supported |
| 5 - 15 | | | | | | | | Reserved |
